title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather app that provides the forecast in a given area over 5 days. The user searches for a given area and the data is converted to a button and stored locally to be retrieved on refresh.

title: Workday Scheduler
description: A fun scheduling app that enables you to schedule your workday with ease. Timeblocks are colour-coded so users will make note of what events are in the past, present and future.

title: Coding Quiz
description: A retro-themed coding quiz that tests the users coding knowledge. A countdown timer is used as the score. Highscores are saved in local storage.

title: Fun Forecast
description: A Webpage for finding out what theatre, music and comedy gigs are in a given area, as well as the weather for the same location.

title: Password Generator
description: A responsive password generator that asks prompts to generate a password based on user preferences. The styling is based on the concept of a mysterious cat called Java, who guards a crypt.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: An app that enables users to dynamically generate a html page with styling that displays employee information, including Manager, Engineers and Interns. The project uses the command line interface, node and inquirer.
